name: Zero Friction
description:
This is a virtual reality hover car racing game, that is specifically developed for use with a racing wheel and pedals, but can also be played with an xbox controller or keyboard.

Race: Race against 3 AI drivers to try and finish in 1st place, in order to unlock the next track.

Best Time: Compete against other players to try and get to the top of the leaderboard for any given track. You can choose between a ghost car of the leader, or your own best time.

Practice: Drive around your selected track without any restrictions, in order to improve your lap times.
